description.descriptionTextOne: DirectShifts is actively recruiting Physicians for exclusive opportunities with startups and hospitals across the U.S.!
description.descriptionTextTwo: Board Eligible and Board Certified candidates are both welcome to apply!
description.descriptionTextThree: We have multiple telehealth, hospital, and short-notice openings available for qualified candidates.
description.descriptionTextFour: Licenses in multiple states is a big plus.
description.descriptionTextFive: As a YCombinator-backed startup, we’re able to offer highly competitive pay for our open roles.

requirements.thirdRequirement: Must have completed a related residency

aboutDirectShiftsText: We connect clinicians with hospitals directly, bypassing external staffing agencies or recruiters.
termsTextMessage: By clicking Apply Now, you agree to our Terms and Privacy.
